text: Stanley John "Stan" Dragoti (October 4, 1932 - July 13, 2018) was an American movie director. He was born in New York City.Stan Dragoti at Film Reference His work includes the comedies Mr. Mom and Love at First Bite.5 Years Later, Dragoti Gets Another Chance. Mann, Roderick. Los Angeles Times (1923-Current File) (Los Angeles, Calif) 17 Feb 1983: i1. Dragoti died on July 13, 2018 in Los Angeles, California from complications of pneumonia at the age of 85.LamtumirÃ«, regjisori Stan Dragoti!
